text.tspan: Change in per capita COâ‚‚ emissions and GDP, World
This measures fossil fuel and industry emissions. Land use change is not included.
Data source: Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden, 2020), Our World in Data based on the Global Carbon Project (2022)
Note: GDP is adjusted for inflation.
